name: Shelf Cat
description:
A super small side project I did to test out the Construct 3 Engine.

Knock off stuff from the shelf to defeat the annoying ghosts haunting your home!
Hold on as long as possible and post your high-score below.

Controls:

Arrows Left / Right & A / D: Move
Arrow Up & W: Jump
Space: Attack

Attribution:
